## Get Stock Price Data
1. Enter a stock symbol.
2. Select your start date (default is 3 months from today).
3. Select you end date (default is today).

![](chart_controls.png)
---

---
## Set Chart Indicators
1. Select an Indicator to add to the chart.
2. Click the 'Get Chart' button to refresh the chart.

![](chart_indicators.png)
